actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that financial institutions shall be required to notify only their active customers regarding the rights of such customers under the Right to Financial Privacy Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Right to Financial Privacy Act of 1978 to require financial institutions to notify only active customers, rather than all customers, of their rights regarding disclosure of financial records to Government authorities.

titles.title: A bill to provide that financial institutions shall be required to notify only their active customers regarding the rights of such customers under the Right to Financial Privacy Act of 1978.
